sentences.en: " Oh, the man's impossible -- an ill - bred boor,'said Scarlett.
sentences.cn: " 唔, 刚才这个人太差劲 ---- 是个没教养的东西, "思嘉说.

sentences.en: Any boor with a fax machine and your phone number can deluge you with unwanted documents.
sentences.cn: 任何粗鲁之徒,只要有一台传真机和你的电话号码,就可以连续不断地向你输送你根本不需要的材料.

sentences.en: At the end of the passage he saw a boor and heard a baby crying.
sentences.cn: 吉姆进入那幢房子,在走廊尽头发现了一扇门,从那门里传来了孩子的哭声.

sentences.en: Here is the consequence of being buried alive: she has thrown herself away upon that boor from sheer ignorance that better individuals existed!
sentences.cn: 这就是隐居的结果：她把自己胡乱嫁给了一个粗俗的农民，全然不知还有更好的人存在！

sentences.en: If he fears the intellectual, he despises the boor.
sentences.cn: 他对知识分子有戒心, 但是更瞧不起乡下人.

sentences.en: She has thrown herself away upon that boor from sheer ignorance that better individuals existed!
sentences.cn: 只因为她全然不知道天下还有更好的人,她就嫁给了那个乡下佬!

words.tran_cn: 粗野的；粗鲁的；粗鄙的；笨拙的；乡土气的
农民；粗野的人；不懂礼貌的人

trans.tran_cn: 农民，乡下佬，没礼貌的人，粗野的人
trans.tran_en: a man who behaves in a very rude way
